headline.main: Philippine Troops Recover Remains of Beheaded German Hostage
headline.print_headline: Philippine Troops Recover Remains of Beheaded German Hostage

lead_paragraph: Philippine soldiers have found the remains of a German man who was beheaded by Islamic State-linked Abu Sayyaf militants last week, a military official said late on Saturday,
snippet: Philippine soldiers have found the remains of a German man who was beheaded by Islamic State-linked Abu Sayyaf militants last week, a military official said late on Saturday,...
